channel.title: Megan Bedell on Astro Data Group
channel.description: Recent content in Megan Bedell on Astro Data Group

item.title: Data viz, meeting design, and other science
item.description: Hello again, world! We (the data group) have been slightly deliquent with this blog lately, but our collective New Year’s Resolution is to post more. (Not really, I just made that up. But here’s hoping!) This particular post is going to be fairly meta, because coming back to the blog after a break seems like a natural opportunity to reflect a bit. In the last couple of months we made some changes to the format of our weekly group meetings.
